property.name: fieldLabel
property.label: Field Label
property.description: The label of the time input.

property.name: fieldValue
property.label: Field Value
property.description: The value of the time input.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Specifies whether users must enter a value. If present, an asterisk is displayed before the label when label-visible is present.

property.name: minTime
property.label: Minimum Time
property.description: The minimum acceptable value for the input using a valid string for the Time type.

property.name: maxTime
property.label: Maximum Time
property.description: The maximum acceptable value for the input using a valid string for the Time type.

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder
property.description: Text that is displayed when the field is empty, to prompt the user for a valid entry.

property.name: timeStyle
property.label: Time Format Style
property.description: The display style of the time. Valid values are short (default), medium, and long. Currently, medium and long styles look the same. On mobile devices this attribute has no effect.

property.name: helpText
property.label: Help Text
property.description: Help text detailing the purpose and function of the input.
